title: Hoshizora Monologue
description: Hoshizora Monologue is a bonus CD sung by Kanon Shibuya, Keke Tang, Chisato Arashi, Sumire Heanna, and Ren Hazuki. The song is featured in Love Live! Superstar!! TV Anime Season 2 Blu-ray 4, which is included in the limited edition version of the fourth Blu-ray release. It was released on December 23, 2022.

infobox.Artist: Kanon Shibuya, Keke Tang, Chisato Arashi, Sumire Heanna & Ren Hazuki
infobox.Label: Lantis
